WorkItem.ClosedComment: This not something that can be handled globally but is model specific, some (most?) models already do this.  If you're requesting this feature for a specific model, then create a new issue for this mentioning the model(s).
WorkItem.Description: I think Rotations should be saveable and loadable via a drop-down list, similar to Talents.  Perhaps link Rotations to Talent specs, so you can easily compare different Talent/Rotation combinations.

Comments.Message: You neglected to mention which model
I assumed it would best be a Base level change, since more than one model uses rotations.  Personally I use DPSDK and sometimes Warlock and TankDK.

The Rotation setups are wholly different per model, it's not something we can just tie into talents, so we can't do that. However, the model devs can probably look into making quick dropdowns as they have time.
